reviews.review_msg: Peter would've been 5/5 if he graded better. The class average for our class was B! B for IAT110. A course no one takes for any other reason than as a GPA booster. B!

He is not really organized. I want to give him a chance esp bc this is his first semester teaching, but all the small things of disorganization adds up. Due dates, rubric, assignment docs and class examples were inconsistent with each other. Slides stated due dates on a dif. semester and assignment docs were inconsistent with rubric found in canvas
